seo.title: Terms & conditions
seo.description: Cancellation policies The dive(s) will need to be paid for in full as soon as the tank is used and you get wet in the pool or ocean, regardless of problems with equalizing, going down or dives cut short for any reason that isn’t the direct fault of Phoenix Divers. All courses: If a course is cancelled before it’s started & any Online Materials (SSI app) are unlocked/opened 2,000thb will be charged – for professional courses the price will be higher. Open Water course: Our refund policy for the Open Water Course is as follows: Drop out or no show […]
